startPage.description: This is the starting page of quiz application.

aboutPage.title: About Our Platform
aboutPage.description: Welcome to our platform! This application was developed to help people communicate with each other, open different companies and find profiles of users and organizations. Regardless of whether you are here to view profiles, browse companies or communicate with other users, we aim to provide a seamless and engaging experience.

usersListPage.title: User List
usersListPage.description: This is the list of users on our platform.
